resources.string:
Welcome to Gesture Drawing Practice, an App designed to display images you select for a specific amount of time.

To select the images, tap the big red button.

Following this, you will have the option to customize your session. You can choose the display time, break time and appearance (or not appearance) of the timer.

Welcome to Gesture Drawing Practice, an open-source app designed to enhance your artistic skills. This app doesn't store any data, ensuring your privacy while you practice. 

Gesture Drawing Practice offers customizable settings to tailor your experience:

• Adjust the display duration
• Set break times between drawings
• Choose whether to display a timer
• Customize the timer's appearance

To begin your session, simply tap the prominent red button to select your reference images.
